short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Save links to your favorite recipes directly to your Inspiced account.
short.de: Speichern Sie Links zu Ihren Lieblingsrezepten direkt in die Inspiced App.
short.fr: Enregistrez les liens vers vos recettes préférées directement sur votre compte Inspiced.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Inspiced Chrome extension makes it easy to save recipes from any website with just one click, keeping all your culinary inspirations organized in one place. With this extension, you can quickly clip recipes from blogs, cooking sites, or even digital cookbooks and have them automatically synced to your Inspiced account. It also allows users to tag and categorize recipes for easy search and retrieval. Whether you're saving a new dish or collecting your favorites, the Chrome extension simplifies recipe management, making meal planning more efficient​.
